definition: become larger in size or volume or quantity
details:
verb
- become larger in size or volume or quantity
= example: become larger in size or volume or quantity
- exaggerate or make bigger
= synonyms: inflate
- grow vigorously
= synonyms: boom
- expand the influence of
= synonyms: extend
- make bigger or wider in size, volume, or quantity
= example: make bigger or wider in size, volume, or quantity
- add details, as to an account or idea
= synonyms: elaborate
- extend in one or more directions
= example: extend in one or more directions
= synonyms: spread out
